column4: When i type --> sudo apt-get install compiz,, I get this error --> The following packages have unmet dependencies:
compiz: Depends: compiz-plugins (>= 0.2) but it is not going to be installed
the compiz packages are broken ... try beryl
I already have beryl installed, I just need compiz too
why do you need compiz also?
cause I thought in order to use beryl, you need compiz
no guy you do not need both
you can also use aiglx if you are running edgy
I prefer it with beryl, yes , on edgy, my prefernce but edgy has aiglx ready by default
you don't need to worry about where it is here is alink to sintal beryl with aiglx and the nvidia drivers    http://forum.beryl-project.org/topic-5021-howto-beryl-aiglx-nvidia-drivers
you need to read slowly and foloow darefully the how to
